messages.content: I would like to test the system to make sure that we have good orchestration between when I stop talking and when it captures my response
What specific problems or frustrations have you experienced in the past with systems that didn't have good orchestration in capturing your responses promptly after you stopped talking?

well I don't know if it's actually listening to me right now for one so I want to make sure that it's going to capture what I'm saying and put it in the speech and then send it and then pause and wait for you to read the next question
Can you elaborate on a specific instance or scenario where you felt unsure if the system was actively listening to you? What was happening at that moment that made you question its responsiveness?
well we would start talking over each other in the transcript we get jumbled and then it would be sending and receiving sending and receiving sending and receiving that nothing would work

Can you describe how frustrating it was for you when the transcript got jumbled due to talking over each other? How did this impact your overall experience with the system and your ability to effectively communicate or interact with it?

Moderator: What specific problems or frustrations have you experienced in the past with systems that didn't have good orchestration in capturing your responses promptly after you stopped talking?

Moderator: Can you elaborate on a specific instance or scenario where you felt unsure if the system was actively listening to you? What was happening at that moment that made you question its responsiveness?
